In addition, the "Plan" proposes the construction of high-quality optic fiber networks, the establishment of multi-tiered computational power supply systems, accelerating the construction of key communication network facilities, and enhancing the Internet application service capability.
The plan is clear, constructing a collaborative Internet of Things sensing system.

Explore the establishment and management mode for city perception terminals based on the "OpenHarmony" open-source operating system, reducing interfacing costs and accelerating the construction of city-level IoT perception platforms, promoting the interconnection and data exchange of city-level IoT platforms and specialized IoT platforms in various industries.

Deepen the application of IoT sensing in urban management, civilian services, public security, and transportation, expanding the fixed sensing and intelligent connected vehicles for city roads, buildings, and public facilities as sensing and collection channels.

By the end of 2023, the number of smart grid sensing terminals for water, electricity, and gas will exceed 900,000, and 20 or more demonstration projects for multi-functional intelligent poles will be constructed.

The plan also mentions strengthening the application of satellite-ground communication integration, building the foundational infrastructure for low-altitude networks, and advancing the deep coverage of 5G networks at sea.
Simultaneously, advancing the depth of 5G network coverage at sea, building an industry innovation ecosystem, and supporting the hosting of top-tier events and activities.

In China's e-commerce industry, how can live streaming maintain the title of "content is king"?
Note: "中新网" is the name of a Chinese news website.
Title: How can Livestream E-commerce in China Achieve "Content is King"? (China Central Net, Feb 11)
Xia Bin, China Central Finance Journalist.
"We entered e-commerce a bit late, but from the very beginning, we realized that standing out among the countless shops required high-quality content."
A young woman from Guangdong, born in the 1990s, runs an herbal supplement shop on Douyin e-commerce, helping a 30-year-old offline store bloom online.

Imitating the style of old Hong Kong movies, with classic Cantonese songs in the background, opening @fragrant_one_person's TikTok account, the exquisite videos are a fresh sight and sound experience.
At the recent Douyin e-commerce event "Finding Companions·Sharing Quality Content Session," Flora represented quality creators and spoke about her daily creation experiences and insights.

She said at the scene: "The carefully crafted videos gained a lot of attention from netizens, many people were interested in my family's ingredients and wanted to cook together, sales soared instantly."

Fragrant dishes, sold through hotpot video broadcasts, have made more people fall in love with "Lao Guang's taste." A single live sale reached 300,000 supplementary ingredients, saving the family business from the brink of closure.
"No content, not e-commerce." With the continuous development of short videos and live e-commerce, people's requirements and standards for e-commerce content are entering a new stage.
In the initial stage of live commerce development, live rooms often attract users with low prices and discounts. Price advantage seemed to be the only selling point at the time.

In recent years, there have been not only phenomenon-level influencers like Liu Zhiming and Dongfang Zhizhong, but also many experts and merchants who have emerged in niche fields. They have enhanced their long-term business benefits by consistently creating high-quality content that fits their brand image.

High Xiaoxuan, the operations manager of Douyin's e-commerce influencer team, introduced that last year, 627 million creators on Douyin monetized their content, and the volume of their content creation grew by 252%, with total transactions more than doubling.
Behind these numbers, we can sense an author ecosystem teeming with vigorous growth and vibrant life force.
"Gaо Yàxuān spoke."

Beijing Normal University's Platform for Propaganda Innovation and Future Media has previously released the "E-commerce Industry Content Health Index (ECHI) Report," analyzing from a data perspective the significance of a new variable - high-quality content - in the current e-commerce industry. The index was used to evaluate the content ecosystem of 27 leading domestic e-commerce platforms.
Based on the report on the e-commerce industry content health index, Douyin Shop, KaKao, Taobao, Pinduoduo, and Jingdong rank first to fifth.

The report states that the ecology of content in the e-commerce industry is a comprehensive concept that integrates e-commerce and content, but not all content can be integrated with e-commerce. Only professional produced content (PGC) and user-generated content (UGC) serve as effective carriers for the integration of content and e-commerce. The higher the value of content platforms, the more diverse the scenarios for consumption and promotion, and the higher the potential for e-commerce penetration, resulting in greater business value. The ratio of content production and consumption in the public domain and private domain of e-commerce is also likely to increase as these domains continue to converge.

At the scene, Professor Yi Guoming of Beijing Normal University's School of Journalism and Communication, and the vice-chairman of the Chinese Media Economics and Management Major Committee, gave an analysis and interpretation of the report.

He stated that, in terms of content value, the e-commerce industry has transitioned from the "accessibility consumption" stage to the "consumption quality" phase. High-quality, professional, and differentiated content serves as the "hard currency" in e-commerce.

At the same time, content becomes the fundamental and crucial grab in the new stage of e-commerce development. Knowledge pay-per-view, professional knowledge, and KOL (Key Opinion Leader) PGC content begin to become standard in e-commerce live streaming.
Looking to the future development of the e-commerce industry, Yun Guo proposes two suggestions.

One is to promote the health and quality of the e-commerce content ecosystem from the perspective of content structure, establishing positive standards for content creation and management, and achieving a balanced index for the health system of the e-commerce industry's content ecosystem.
Another one is to promote the harmonious development of the content e-commerce industry from an external ecological perspective, and create value collaboratively with the external environment.

The future e-commerce industry requires more support in data and artificial intelligence to make stable predictions for its development; in addition, providing more regulated and healthy growth spaces for merchants, enabling the value alignment of enterprises, users, products, and services in the e-commerce industry, and co-creating a healthy content ecosystem.

Xinhua commentator: Advancing Chinese-style modernization is a systematic engineering project - key points from Xi Jinping's important speech at the study and implement the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China's opening ceremony - China New Network.

Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, February 11th - Title: The Process of Modernization in China is a Systemic Engineering - Four Essential Insights from Comrade Xi Jinping's Speech at the Study and Implement the Spirit of the 20th CPC National Congress Seminar Opening Ceremony.
New China Commentator (or New China Commentator: Xinhua Commentator)

Advancing Chinese-style modernization is a systematic engineering project that requires comprehensive planning, coordinated management, and overall promotion. It is essential to handle correctly the relationships between top-level design and practical exploration, strategies and tactics, principles and innovation, efficiency and fairness, vitality and order, self-reliance and opening up to the outside world.

At the opening ceremony of the study class for members, alternate members, and leading cadres of the new Central Committee at the forefront of provincial level, General Secretary Xi Jinping scientifically grasped the laws of modernization construction and systematically expounded on the practical issues that need to be addressed, providing us with a scientific methodology for vigorously promoting Chinese-style modernization.

Advancing Chinese modernization involves economics, politics, culture, society, ecological civilization, and other fields, relating to governance, party, government, military, domestic and foreign affairs, requiring systematic planning as well as courage to reform and innovate, and continuously achieving overall progress.

To conduct top-level design, one must have a deep understanding of the major trends in global development, accurately grasp the common wishes of the people, deeply explore the laws of economic and social development, and ensure that the planning and policy systems are reflective of the times, in line with laws, and innovative. This should result in a harmonious blend of short-term and long-term considerations, as well as coordination in content.

Pursuing Chinese-style modernization is an exploratory endeavor with many unknown territories, requiring bold exploration in practice, driving business development through reform and innovation, and not being overly cautious or passive.
Strategic issues are fundamental matters for a party and a country.

Advancing Chinese modernization requires enhancing the prospective nature of our strategy, using scientific foresight to lead and shape the future; enhancing the global scope of our strategy, focusing on major issues that concern the survival and success or failure of the Party and the state, and have far-reaching consequences; and enhancing the stability of our strategy, once formed, it must be persisted in, grasped firmly, and well implemented.

To scientifically unify the contradictory relationship between strategy and tactics, to harmoniously combine the principled nature of strategies with the flexibility of tactics, to be agile, adaptable, and make decisions on the spot. Act according to the situation, seize opportunities, and adapt to the circumstances while implementing strategic initiatives.
The Chinese people are a nation that upholds righteousness and innovate.

Maintain a good relationship between tradition and innovation, while firmly holding on to the essence, characteristics, and soul of Chinese-style modernization. At the same time, place innovation in a prominent position in the national development agenda, responding to the requirements of the times, focusing on solving major theoretical and practical problems, actively adapting and seeking change, and vigorously promoting reform and innovation. Continuously shaping new development energy and new competitive advantages.
Efficiency is an important foundation of fairness, fairness is an effective guarantee of efficiency.

We advance Chinese-style modernization, requiring not only the creation of higher efficiency than capitalism, but also more effectively maintaining social fairness, better achieving a balance between efficiency and fairness, and promoting their mutual advancement and unity.

Manage efficiency and fairness in harmony, continuously achieving development for the benefit of the people, relying on the people, and ensuring that development achievements are more widespread and fair for all.
Advancing Chinese modernization requires handling the relationship between vitality and order, allowing society to be both vibrant and stable.

To coordinate the development and security of the two major issues, carry out the comprehensive national security viewpoint, perfect the national security system, enhance the ability to maintain national security, and firmly maintain the security of the state power, institutions, ideology, and key areas.

Consider safety factors in development, enhance national security capabilities through development, fortify the foundation of national security with development achievements, and cultivate a favorable environment for economic and social development, continuously stimulating development vitality, and achieving harmonious interaction between high-quality development and high-level security.

Advancing Chinese modernization requires both sticking to our own path and expanding global perspectives, insisting on opening up to the outside world, and continuously broadening and deepening the scope of Chinese modernization.

Insist on self-reliance, self-governance, and self-strengthening. Insist on developing the country and nation based on our own strength. Insist on firmly grasping the fate of China's development in our own hands.

Continuously expanding high-level opening to the outside world, deepening participation in global industrial division of labor and cooperation, making good use of domestic and international resources, expanding the development space for Chinese-style modernization, and sharing development opportunities and creating a beautiful future through mutual benefits.
Walking the path diligently is the way to achieve far-reaching results.

Let us firmly grasp the rules, resolutely carry out the tasks, and fully exert our initiative, enthusiasm, and creativity under the strong leadership of Comrade Xi Jinping at the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and under the guidance of Xi Jinping's new era of Chinese-style socialism with Chinese characteristics. Let us correctly handle various major relationships and make significant contributions to the new journey of building a modernized socialist country in all respects.
The Biden administration added 6 Chinese entities suspected of involvement in the balloon spy program to the blacklist on February 10, 2023.

The US Commerce Department stated that these five Chinese companies and one research institution have assisted the Chinese military in modernization, particularly in aerospace projects, including vessels and aircraft.
Companies on the blacklist find it difficult to obtain US technology exports.
The list is called an "entity list," and companies listed on it cannot purchase technology or goods from US suppliers without obtaining a special export license from the US Department of Commerce.

The companies on the blacklist are: Beijing South China Skytech Co. Ltd., China Electronics Technology Group Corporation 48th Research Institute, Dongguan Lingspace Remote Sensing Technology Co. Ltd., Yunmen Aviation Technology Group Co. Ltd., Guangzhou Tianhaisheng Aviation Technology Co. Ltd., and Shanxi Yunmen Aviation Technology Group Co. Ltd.
Before this, the White House indicated consideration of broader measures to "expose and deal with" larger-scale surveillance activities threatening American national security from China.
The balloon incident further tense the US-China relationship, causing US Secretary of State Antony Blinken to cancel his visit to China.

The Chinese government expressed serious protests to the US embassy in China on February 4th, criticizing the US for seriously disrupting and damaging the efforts and processes of Sino-US relations by shooting down a balloon.

Based on existing debris evidence and information from China's military procurement platform, the US government concluded that the manufacturer of this balloon "has a direct relationship with the Chinese People's Liberation Army," and is an approved supplier by the Chinese military.

Chinese Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Mao Ning stated at a press conference on Friday that China has repeatedly explained the situation and clarified our position regarding the unexpected incident of a Chinese civilian drone entering US airspace due to force majeure.
According to the foreign ministry website, she further stated that the related resolutions passed by the US Congress are purely political manipulation and sensationalism.
The Chinese side is strongly dissatisfied and firmly opposes it.

Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Export Enforcement at the US Department of Commerce, Matthew Axelrod, stated: "Today's actions demonstrate our joint efforts in uncovering and preventing China's use of spy balloons, which have violated the airspace of the United States and over 40 other countries."
Reuters reported that an employee of Guangzhou Tianhai Aviation Technology Co. Ltd. said they were unaware of the sanctions and declined to comment further.
The Chinese embassy in the United States has not issued a comment on these matters yet.
Reuters et al.

(Deutsche Welle Chinese Website) It has been several days since an earthquake struck parts of Turkey and Syria, hope of finding survivors is fading, but the rescue team was overjoyed to find a family of five alive on Saturday.
According to Reuters report, a family of five in the disaster-stricken town of Nurdahi in Jammu and Kashmir, India, were rescued after being trapped under rubble for more than five days.
Rescue workers first pulled out a mother and her daughter from a pile of ruins. Later, they found the father, but he insisted on rescuing his own son and another daughter first.
When they were all rescued, a cheer went up from the crowd.
In the southern city of Kahramanmaras in Turkey, a 16-year-old boy and an old woman of 70 were successfully rescued under harsh winter conditions.
"What day is today?"
The boy, who had been trapped under the ruins for 129 hours, asked to be rescued by the rescuers after being brought back to the ground.
A Karim Langhar man holds his recently rescued cat.
Miraculous success stories in rescue work brought a ray of hope to an otherwise despairing search, but at the same time, the number of casualties continued to rise.
According to official statistics, over 2,000 people have died in Turkey due to the earthquake on Monday, and the death toll in neighboring Syria is estimated to be over 3,500.
Despite experts estimating that a person can survive for more than a week after being trapped in ruins, the hope of finding more survivors has become increasingly vague.
Rescue workers are still searching for signs of life beneath the ruins, using thermal imaging equipment.
At the same time, the focus of rescue work shifts towards assisting those in dire need of help.
United Nations official: This region's disaster is "unseen in a century."

Martin Griffiths, the UN Deputy Secretary-General and Humanitarian Affairs Coordinator, speaking at a press conference in Turkey, described this earthquake as "the worst disaster in the region in a century."
He praised Turkey's response to the disaster as "unusual" or "extraordinary."
He also told Reuters reporters that he hoped to provide relief to areas controlled by both the Syrian government and the opposition, but added that the related matters were "still unclear."
The United Nations pledges an additional $2,500,000 in relief donations to the Syrian people affected by earthquakes.
The United Nations has already allocated $2.5 billion for disaster relief in Turkey and Syria this week.
The most destructive earthquake that has occurred on a global scale in the past 60 years.
Chile Earthquake (1960)
At local time, on May 22, 1960, in the afternoon at 3:11 p.m., the largest earthquake recorded in human history occurred in Valdivia, Chile. Its magnitude was 9.5 on the Richter scale.
In just ten minutes, Vladivostok's entire city lay in ruins.
After an earthquake, a massive tsunami struck the Chilean coastline, with waves reaching heights of up to 25 meters.
Typhoon reaches remote Japan, Philippines.
The number of casualties and economic losses caused by this disaster within this range cannot be precisely known.
The most destructive earthquake that has occurred on a global scale in the past 60 years.
Alaska Earthquake (1964)
March 27, 1964, was a Friday and also Good Friday.
This day, an earthquake of magnitude 9.2 on the Richter scale occurred in Alaska, USA, in North American history.
Up until 2006, the Alaskan earthquake still held the record as the third largest in the world.
An earthquake occurs, causing a fault line between the Pacific Plate and the North American Plate to rupture near Williamson Bay, close to Monterey Bay.
This earthquake lasted between 3 to 5 minutes in most areas.
The bed of the sea caused a huge tidal wave, with a height of 67 meters.
Due to it being a holiday, the school and many businesses were closed.
This earthquake ultimately claimed the lives of 139 people.
Nine people died directly from the earthquake, while one hundred and thirty people died from the tsunami triggered by the earthquake.
The most destructive earthquake that has occurred on a global scale in the past 60 years.
Tangshan Earthquake (1976)
On July 28, 1976, there were two earthquakes, each with a magnitude of 7 or above, in Tangshan City, Hebei Province, China, within a span of 16 hours.
The epicenter is 23 kilometers beneath the surface.
The entire transportation, communication, water supply, and power grid of Tangshan City were disrupted, leaving it leveled in an instant.
The capital Beijing also feels strong tremors 140 kilometers away.
According to official statistics, a total of 242,769 people have died and 164,851 have been seriously injured in areas including Beijing and Tianjin due to the earthquake.
The Tangshan earthquake is the second deadliest earthquake in China's recorded history, surpassed only by the 1556 Shaanxi Earthquake.
However, some overseas scientists estimate that at least 65,000 people may have been killed by this earthquake.
The most destructive earthquake that has occurred on a global scale in the past 60 years.
Indian Ocean Earthquake (2004)

On December 26, 2004, an earthquake occurred off the west coast of Aceh Province, Indonesia, about 160 kilometers south of Sumatra Island. The earthquake was located 30 kilometers deep with a magnitude of 9.1 to 9.3 on the Richter scale.
Earthquake triggered waves up to 15-30 meters high.

The Pacific Ocean coastline is affected by a total of 14 countries, among which the areas most severely affected include Aceh Province in Indonesia, Pattani in Thailand, and the tourist regions of Lombok and Bali in Indonesia and Sri Lanka.

During the Christmas holiday season, a large number of tourists and local residents gathered in disaster-stricken areas, resulting in many tourists enjoying their vacation on the beach and local people working by the sea being swept into the sea by a typhoon, making this earthquake leave many people missing.
According to estimates, the number of deceased and missing people is at least 300,000.
The most destructive earthquake that has occurred on a global scale in the past 60 years.
Sichuan Earthquake (2008)
On May 12, 2008, a major earthquake occurred in Sichuan Province, China.

According to the data from the China Earthquake Administration, the magnitude of this earthquake's surface waves reached 8.2 on the Richter scale, and its moment magnitude reached 8.3. The affected area is over 100,000 square kilometers.

As of September 25, 2008, a total of 69,227 people had died, 17,923 were missing, 374,643 had been injured to varying degrees, and 1,993,030 had lost their homes, making a total affected population of 4,625,660 people.
It is the earthquake with the greatest destructive power in the history of the People's Republic of China, and the one with the heaviest casualties after the Tangshan earthquake.

The Chinese government declared that May 12th of every year would be China's Disaster Prevention and Mitigation Day, strengthening education for the public and focus on disaster prevention and mitigation work.
Many Chinese governments and primary and secondary schools hold earthquake drills every year.
Elementary and middle schools are starting to attach importance to popularizing "earthquake prevention and mitigation" education.
The most destructive earthquake that has occurred on a global scale in the past 60 years.
Earthquake (2010)
January 12, 2010, a 7.0 magnitude earthquake occurred in the Caribbean Sea near the islands.
The epicenter is located about 25 kilometers southwest of Taipei City, the capital city of Taiwan, and is approximately 13 kilometers deep beneath the surface.
The International Red Cross estimates that approximately 300,000 people have been affected by the earthquake.
The number of confirmed deaths announced by the government of the sea area is over 20,000.
In some regions inside the country, over 90% of the houses were destroyed by the earthquake.
Despite ample aid and support from the international community, this country with an overpopulated and corrupt society has not recovered from this calamity.
The most destructive earthquake that has occurred on a global scale in the past 60 years.
Japan Earthquake (Eastern Part) of 2011.
A large-scale reverse fault earthquake of magnitude 9.0 occurred in the eastern sea of Japan on March 11, 2011.

The epicenter of the earthquake is located to the east of Tainan City, the capital of Pingtung County, in the Pacific Ocean. The depth of the earthquake's source was measured to be 24,000 meters, and it triggered a large tsunami with a maximum height of 40.1 meters.
This is the first earthquake in Japan with a magnitude greater than 9 on record.
Approximately 22,000 people have perished in the disaster, and around 40,000 buildings have been completely destroyed or collapsed.
The Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant experienced a nuclear leak due to the influence of an earthquake and a tsunami.
This incident is classified as Level 7, the most severe, on the International Nuclear Event Scale (INES).
The Fukushima nuclear accident resulted in the detection of trace radioactive materials worldwide, including Iodine-131 and Cesium-137 (half-life of 30 years).
Large amounts of radioactive isotopes were released into the Pacific Ocean due to the nuclear accident.
According to the statistics of the United Nations, at least 87,000 people in the disaster areas of Syria and Iraq require food aid.
In Syria alone, over 530,000 people have lost their homes due to earthquakes.
The World Food Programme (WFP) appeals for a contribution of $7,700,000 to provide food for the displaced people in Turkey and Syria due to earthquakes.
The temperature in the disaster area is currently below zero, and many disaster victims have no shelter.
The Turkish government distributed large quantities of hot meals, tents, and blankets, but these resources still proved difficult to reach many in dire need.
In Syria, which has been mired in a deep internal conflict for over a dozen years, the people's suffering was further aggravated by earthquakes.
In the four days after an earthquake, the World Food Programme provided food aid to 11,500 people in Turkey and Syria.
The World Health Organization (WHO) sent 72 tons of medical supplies for trauma treatment and emergency surgeries.
(Associated Press, Reuters etc.)

Police Department Alert: Fake Telecommunications Companies Scam Messages, Citizens Urged to Be Cautious.

In recent days, the telecommunications bureau has received several cases of telecommunications scams. Criminals posing as the Australian telecommunications company have sent fraudulent text messages to victims with links to fake websites, luring them to log in and exchange points that are about to expire for rewards.

The account holder entered credit card information and verification code according to instructions, but received a notice from the financial institution about unusual credit card transactions, suspecting that the credit card information was stolen from the above website.
After investigation, there is no record of the relevant telecommunications company sending the aforementioned text message.

The traffic police department urges citizens to be vigilant if they receive similar text messages and not to click on the website links or provide any personal information in them. If asked to provide credit card information, account transaction passwords, or transaction verification codes, be extra cautious to prevent credit card fraud.
Fraud warning:
Pay more attention to network security news to enhance personal awareness of prevention.
Do not casually log into unfamiliar websites and register personal or credit card information to avoid having it stolen.
Be cautious of counterfeit and phishing websites, always check if the website URL completely matches the official one.
Install antivirus software on your phone, mobile device, or computer, and keep it updated regularly.
When suspecting scams or other crimes, call the anti-fraud inquiry hotline 8800 7777 or report to the police hotline 993 for assistance.
A large Hong Kong inspection team visits Macau tourism facilities, attracting Hong Kong tourists and expanding "linked tourism" between Hong Kong and Macau.

The Hong Kong Tourism Bureau, along with representatives from the travel industry and media, organized a large-scale Hong Kong inspection team of over 100 people to Macau. The itinerary for the two-day visit (10th and 11th) included not only work meetings and industry discussions, but also separate visits by Hong Kong travel agency and media representatives to multiple Macau tourist sites, hotels, and tourism-related facilities, introducing the latest Macau tourism products to the Hong Kong market and promoting cultural exchange between the two regions, collectively boosting the "Hong Kong-Macau 'Linked Tourism'" market.
Conducting on-site inspections to introduce new tourism practices in Macau.

This Hong Kong delegation of over 100 people includes leaders from Hong Kong government tourism-related departments, more than 60 representatives from travel agencies and cross-border transportation operators in Hong Kong and Macau, as well as approximately 30 journalists from travel magazines and newspapers, travel social media, network media representatives, and bloggers/influencers. They visited Macau to learn about the latest tourism resources in Macau, bringing new tourism offerings in Hong Kong for residents and tourists, and expanding the "linked tourism" market between Hong Kong and Macau through the advantages of Hong Kong's transportation hub.
A tight schedule for two days, seeking business opportunities, increasing propaganda.

The inspection team visited the "Historic Centre of Macau," a UNESCO World Heritage site, and experienced the Macau Grand Prix Museum. They also explored the "Time Travel 3B" immersive digital experience exhibition at the Three Bays Bayfront, as well as the Venetian Macao, The Parisian Macao, The Londoner Macao, Galaxy Macau, The Karl Lagerfeld, and MGM Macau, among other large resort hotels and facilities, including Artelli Multidimensional Art Space at The Venetian Macao and teamLab Borderless at The Museum of Art, Macau.

A delegation member of the inspection team visits tourism facilities in Macau, experiences Macau's "tourism+ elements" firsthand, and shares Macau's tourism resources and travel experiences with Hong Kong residents. They also integrate and introduce and sell the latest Macau tourism products to Hong Kong residents.
Attracting Hong Kong tourists, expanding "linked travel" between Hong Kong and Macau.

Leveraging the opportunity of the Hong Kong-Macau Through-Travel Scheme, the tourism bureau rolled out marketing campaigns in the Hong Kong market, which include discounts on transportation tickets, promotional ads for new commercials online and offline, etc.

Last month, we invited travel industry leaders from Hong Kong to visit Macau for exchange and experience Hong Kong influencers' personal exploration of Macau's "tourism+". This time, we are organizing another visit for representatives from the Hong Kong travel industry and media to Macau for inspection, increasing marketing promotion efforts, attracting Hong Kong tourists to stay and consume in Macau, and deepening business cooperation between the two industries to expand the Hong Kong-Macau "linked tourism" market, covering both domestic and overseas markets, and promoting the revival of the travel industries in both regions.

Xi Jinping sends letter of encouragement to medical teams from developing countries, using kind heart and practical actions to benefit local people and tell a good story of China - Scroll News - Hunan Daily Network - Huasheng Online.
Xi Jinping's letter encourages and supports medical teams from developing countries, treating local people with compassionate care, and telling a good Chinese story through practical actions.
February 11, 2023 13:09:10 [Source: Xinhua] [Editor: Li Xiufeng] Font size: [Big Middle Small]

Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, February 10 - Chinese Communist Party General Secretary, State Chairman, and Central Military Commission Chairman Xi Jinping sent a letter to the members of the 19th Chinese medical team sent to assist Chad on February 9. He extended his greetings to them and all Chinese medical teams dispatched abroad, expressing his heartfelt hopes.

Xi Jinping wrote in his letter that you are overcoming difficulties in work and life in Chad, serving local people with sincerity, acting as both angelic saviors in white, and friendly messengers of love.
This year marks the 60th anniversary of China dispatching medical teams abroad. Sincere condolences to those currently and previously engaged in medical aid missions.
Xi Jinping pointed out that the Chinese people love peace and value life, and aiding in foreign medical assistance is a vivid expression of this.

I hope you all do not forget your initial aspirations and remember your mission, and strive to promote the spirit of fearless in hardship, selfless service, saving lives, and boundless love of the Chinese medical team. By acting with compassion and compassionate care, benefit the local people, tell the Chinese story through practical actions, and make greater contributions to the construction of a common health and wellbeing for humanity.
Aid medical services are an important part of China's foreign aid work.
In 1963, China dispatched its first medical aid team to Algeria.

Over the past 60 years, a total of 30,000 medical personnel have been sent to 76 countries and regions in Africa, Asia, America, Europe, and Oceania, treating over 2.9 billion patients, earning widespread acclaim from the international community.
Currently, medical teams are serving in 115 medical points in 56 countries around the world, with about half of them working in remote and hard-to-reach areas.

Recently, eleven members of the 19th batch of Chinese medical aid team to Africa wrote a letter to General Secretary Xi Jinping, reporting on their implementation of the spirit of the 20th Party Congress and providing medical services to local people, expressing their determination to contribute to the building of a common health community for mankind.

New members, alternate members, and leading cadres at the provincial level of the new Central Committee have completed their study classes on comprehensively implementing Xi Jinping's new era Chinese-style socialism thoughts and the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

Central Committee members, alternate members, and leading officials at the provincial level graduate from study classes on comprehensively studying Xi Jinping's new era Chinese-style socialism thoughts and the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.
February 11, 2023 13:07:20 [Source: Xinhua] [Editor: Li Xuefeng] Font size: [Big Middle Small]

Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, February 10th - The study class on implementing Xi Jinping's new era Chinese-style socialism thoughts and the spirit of the 20th CPC National Congress for new Central Committee members, alternate members, and provincial-level leading cadres graduated from the Central Party School (National Administration Institute) in the afternoon. Members of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Secretary of the CPC Central Propaganda Department Cai Qi attended the graduation ceremony and gave a concluding speech.

He expressed the need to deeply study and carry out the spirit of Comrade Xi Jinping's important speeches delivered at the opening ceremony of the study sessions, more firmly uphold the "Two Establishments" and resolutely do the "Two Maintenance" tasks, enhance capabilities, truly grasp and implement various projects for China's modernization, and create achievements that can withstand historical, practical, and people's scrutiny in the process of building a comprehensive modernized socialist country and thoroughly advancing the great revival of the Chinese nation.

During the study session, all members seriously studied Xi Jinping's new era Chinese-style socialism thoughts as a guide, earnestly learned the spirits of the 20th National Congress and important speeches of General Secretary Xi Jinping at the study session opening ceremony. They deeply discussed and exchanged ideas, deepening their understanding of major theoretical and practical issues related to China's modernization, enhancing their confidence and determination to carry out the great revival of the Chinese nation under the strong leadership of the CPC Central Committee with Xi Jinping as the core, and enhancing their sense of duty and mission to fulfill their responsibilities, do their jobs well, and ensure a good start for the new journey of the new era.
At the graduation ceremony, ten representatives from Study Group spoke about their learning experiences and shared their gains from the exchange.

Caidi expressed that learning and implementing Xi Jinping's new era Chinese-style socialism thoughts and the spirit of the 20th Party Congress is not only the primary political task for the present and the future, but also a long-term strategic task. It should be carried out in accordance with the requirements of "comprehensively studying, comprehensively grasping, and comprehensively implementing." This will continue to push forward the study and implementation of the work, making it deeper, more real, and more heartfelt.

To deeply understand the significance of "the two establishments," we must firmly maintain Xi Jinping's core position as General Secretary, uphold the authority and centralized command of the CPC Central Committee, continuously enhance our political judgment, political comprehension, and political execution abilities, and consistently align ourselves with Xi Jinping comrades-in-arms at the CPC Central Committee in thought, politics, and action.

To master Marxist theory well, consciously arm one's mind with the innovative theories of the Party, diligently study and ponder, and firmly carry out the learning of unwavering beliefs, absolute loyalty, and sense of mission.

Implement the decisions and deployments of the Party's 20th National Congress with great enthusiasm and dedication, firmly advance Chinese modernization, roll up our sleeves and work hard, take the lead as "construction foremen," and turn blueprints into reality with each step.

Remember the full and strict governance of the Party forever, the Party's self-revolution is forever on the path, strictly enforce political responsibility, take the political construction of the Party as the leading role, and deeply advance the new great project of building the Party in the new era.

To strengthen the leadership in driving high-quality development, serving the masses, and preventing and resolving risks. Vigorously promote investigation and research, and resolutely prevent and overcome formalism and bureaucratism.
Stone Taipei, Li Ganjie, Li Shuili, Chen Wenqing, Liu Jingguo, Wang Xiaohong attended the graduation ceremony. Chenxi hosted the graduation ceremony.
Google's AI chatbot, "answering questions," loses its mother company over $1 billion in market capitalization.
(According to the 11th report)

Google's newly released artificial intelligence chatbot, Bard, suffered a setback in its promotional video where it gave incorrect answers, causing Alphabet's stock to plunge 8.9% on Thursday, dropping below the $100 mark for the first time, and wiping out over $11 billion (approximately 4765 billion yuan) in market value, closing at $94.57 on Friday.
The market is concerned that Alphabet (Google's parent company) may not keep up with its competitor Microsoft.

According to a Reuters report, Google promoted its AI chatbot Bard in social media earlier on, in a video clip where someone asked Bard: "What new discoveries about the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) can I tell a 9-year-old child?"
Bard mentioned in his answer that the first photograph of planets outside the solar system was taken by this telescope.

However, according to data from the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) in the United States, the first image of a planet outside our solar system was taken by the "Very Large Telescope" of the European Southern Observatory in 2004.
Reuters reports with the title "Bard Answers Incorrectly, Alphabet Stock Plunges."

On the other hand, Google emphasized that Bard's response "highlights the importance of rigorous testing processes." It will combine external feedback with its own internal testing to ensure that Bard's response "meets high standards in quality, safety, and truthful information."
Singapore's tourism industry recovery is robust, with inbound travelers growing 19-fold compared to 2021.

The Singapore Tourism Board recently announced that the number of international tourists visiting Singapore in 2023 is projected to reach between 12 and 14 million, generating approximately 180 to 210 billion Singapore dollars in tourism revenue. The number of tourists and tourism revenue are expected to recover to around 67% to 75% of pre-pandemic levels in 2019. The likelihood of the tourism industry achieving full recovery by 2024 is significant.
The Singapore tourism market is gradually restarting and recovering in 2022.

The latest statistics released by Singapore's Tourism Board show that the number of inbound tourists in 2022 reached 630 million, a 19-fold increase from the 33.06 million in 2021. This surpasses the earlier estimate of 400,000 to 600,000 tourists, and the tourist numbers have recovered to 33% of the pre-pandemic level.

From January to September 2022, Singapore's tourism revenue totaled 89.6 billion SGD, with an estimated full-year revenue reaching 138-143 billion SGD. This represents a 6-fold to 7-fold increase from the 18.9 billion SGD in 2021, and a recovery to approximately 50-52% of the pre-pandemic level in 2019.
The Singapore government is taking various measures to accelerate the revival of the tourism industry.
In April 2022, the government announced the allocation of around 5 billion yuan to stimulate the revival of the tourism industry.

The tourism bureau announced previously that they will allocate 1.1 billion yuan from the budget in the next two years to introduce more commercial and recreational activities to attract tourists back.

To make health and wellness a major tourist attraction in Singapore, the Singapore Tourism Board announced on November 23, 2022, an invitation for expressions of interest to develop a health and wellness site on Singapore's southern coast.
Madam Wang Lingli of Singapore Tourism Board's Sports, Health, and Wellness Division stated that an increasing number of tourists are prioritizing physical health in their considerations.

Developing a health and wellness site in the southern district of Singapore, which is home to Marina Bay Gardens and Marina Bay Front Promenade, has the potential to contribute to Singapore's tourism industry and economy by encouraging visitors to spend and stay longer.
The chairman of Singapore Tourism Board, Chen Tianlong, stated that health and wellness will become a significant component of Singapore's tourism products in the coming few years.
The awareness and demand for bodily and mental health have been heightened by the COVID-19 situation.
The tourism bureau has been promoting health and wellness projects to local residents and international tourists for the past two years.
In June 2022, the Singapore Tourism Board held the first Health and Wellness Festival, offering over 130 various health activities and experiences for the public.
Singapore will continue to provide new travel experiences for tourists.

Besides the newly opened Children's Museum in Singapore, the Avatar World in Gardens by the Bay, the Central Business District's Orchard Road ArtScience Museum's "Explore New Domains" Hall, and the Night Safari's new open-air amphitheater, the tourism board will support the development and updating of projects like the Wildlife World's Bird Park. This will make Singapore an attractive international travel destination.

According to the plan, Singapore will establish industry standards for meetings, exhibitions, and rewarding tourism sectors with sustainable development by the end of 2023, with a focus on improving waste management and carbon emissions issues.
The revival of tourism in Singapore has accelerated the recovery of the aviation industry.

According to the data, as of December 18, 2022, Tianjin Airport passenger traffic has shown robust recovery, with daily passenger throughput reaching over 150,000 and weekly passenger throughput approaching 100,000, which is approximately 75% of the pre-pandemic level. The workforce of the aviation industry has also recovered to around 90% of its pre-pandemic level.

The data shows that Singapore welcomed 23.6 million tourist arrivals from January to October 2022, which is about 42% of the pre-pandemic level. There were 170,000 takeoff and landing flights, which is about 53% of the pre-pandemic level.
The tourism industry is rapidly recovering, driving the revival of industries such as accommodation, transportation, food and beverage, and retail.
The Singaporean government and its tourism industry hold high hopes for the Chinese market.

The CEO of the International Liaison Office of Singapore Tourism Board, Koh Sue Ann, stated that a survey conducted by a Chinese travel platform shows that Singapore's safety index ranks among the top three globally, which is one reason why it is popular among Chinese tourists.
Before the COVID-19 outbreak, about 360,000 Chinese people traveled to Singapore for tourism each year.
With China easing border policies, it is estimated that the number of Chinese tourists this year could recover to around 30-60% of the 2019 level.
The Madame Liu Shouchuan pointed out that the Tourism Bureau will closely monitor the further signals of China's policies towards outbound travel, in response to changing tourist demands.

The Singapore Tourism Board, apart from strengthening partnerships with Chinese online travel platforms like Ctrip, will also actively prepare to welcome Chinese tourists in response to new trends in outbound travel from China.

Looking towards the tourism market in 2023, the Singapore Tourism Board is confident, believing that as long as the global economy does not experience significant downturns affecting public income, and there are no new large-scale fatal epidemic outbreaks, the tourism industry recovery steps will be faster than expected.
Jin Zhenen's father-son relationship is intimate, his wife is neglected on the side.

North Korea held a military parade on the 8th of March for the 75th anniversary of the Army Foundation Day. Kim Jong-un's daughter, Kim Ju-ae, not only attended but also stood on the podium with her father.

North Korean media released a video on the 9th, showing Kim Jong-un leaning against his father's side, with numerous tender exchanges and whispered conversations. However, Madam Li Xuezhu could only step aside.

North Korean state media "Chinese Central Television" released parade footage after the event, revealing more heartfelt scenes of parents and children.

Kim Jong-un gazed at his daughter several times from the podium, their smiles never fading. They whispered secrets into each other's ears. Kim placed both hands on his father's cheeks, and Kim Jong-un responded with a radiant smile.

Other media footage also shows Jin Jiaoi touching her father's face repeatedly with her hands while they sat on indoor sofa chairs together. She was also seen holding her father's hand and touching his chest as they walked.
The first wife, Li Xuezhu, could only follow behind or sit to the side, always keeping a few steps away from her husband and daughter.

South Korean media reported that the North Korean leader, Kim Jong-un, was seen in public for the fifth time since his first appearance after testing 17 intercontinental ballistic missiles last November 18th. The frequency of his appearances has increased significantly over the past three months.

North Korean media mentioned the "Dear Leader" Kim Jong-il using the most beloved and esteemed titles, and broadcast clips of him repeatedly shouting his oath to protect the "white-haired bloodline" during military parades.

These signs have raised suspicions among the outside world that Kim Jong-un has been designated as the heir to the Kim dynasty, with The Washington Post analyzing that "this is Kim Jong-un positioning his college-aged daughter as his successor," but there are also opinions that such a judgment is premature, as there are still various possibilities given that Kim Jong-un has a son on his knee.
How to view the US January non-farm employment data significantly exceeding expectations and future trends - Economic Observer - Professional Economic News Website.
Q: How does Rezone Capital view the US non-farm employment data for January significantly exceeding expectations and future trends?

The US Labor Department published the non-farm employment data for January 2023, with an addition of 517,000 new jobs, significantly more than the anticipated 189,000; the unemployment rate dropped to 3.4%, reaching a near-record low; hourly wages rose by 4.4% year-on-year, and 0.3% month-on-month, with a slight deceleration.

From the total perspective, this data is subject to many one-time and technical factors, such as striking employees returning to work, adjustments to survey statistical methods, and updates to seasonal factors. Subsequent revisions are possible (referring to an increase of 14.6 million non-agricultural workers in January 2022 being revised down to 10.4 million). The non-agricultural employment situation may not be as strong as the data suggests.

Structurally, the layoff impact on high-tech companies is still noticeable but relatively low; on the other hand, labor demand in high-contact service industries such as leisure hotels, education, and healthcare has significantly rebounded, with data showing a persistent labor shortage in the service sector.

Based on the rebound and shrinkage of service sector PMI, job vacancies, and labor shortages, as well as the robust consumption credit data, we conclude that the US service sector is experiencing a rapid recovery after extreme weather and holidays.
We believe that the labor market in the United States, without going through a recession, will find it hard to alleviate its tight supply and demand situation.

The US labor market currently has a supply gap of over 500,000, while the labor force participation rate is increasing slowly, particularly the labor force participation rate of those aged 25-54, which is approaching its pre-pandemic high.
Besides this, due to the robust consumption demand of American residents from excess savings and consumer credit, the effect of tight monetary policy on the labor market will be further delayed.
The US labor market will remain tight, setting the tone for the US economy in 2023.
With interest rate hikes nearing an end and inflation expectations fluctuating, we are not optimistic about the continued decline in wage growth.
Before the data release, the expectations of the Federal Reserve's interest rate hike path in the US bond market were overly optimistic.

With the continued improvement of inflation data, the Federal Reserve is shortening its rate hike pace while maintaining the delicate balance of market inflation expectations, but the market overlooks the Federal Reserve's hawkish tone and anticipates an early end to rate hikes, even predicting two rate cuts by year-end.

In a tight labor market, with the impact of monetary policy uncertain, we believe the Fed's indication of rate hikes at year-end is relatively reasonable. The market's extreme expectations adjustment and crowded trading may cause some harm to the market.

Despite this, the stubbornly high wage growth rate may only serve as a floor for future inflation data, as M2 growth has turned negative and various CPI components have begun to improve since October. US CPI data has been trending towards rapid decline since then. The persistence of high wage growth rates is currently difficult to disprove in the market's expectations, and the market may enter a new round of speculation after the next inflation data is released.

Zengh Yonggang, the founder of Sanyou, passed away suddenly due to heart disease. He led the first transformation of China's clothing industry - Economic Observer - Professional Financial News Website.

The economic observer Zheng Yan from China Economic Net published an obituary on WeChat, on February 11th, for Zheng Yonggang, the founder of Siping Group Co. Ltd. (hereafter referred to as "Siping Group"), who passed away on February 10, 2023, due to a sudden heart disease that proved refractory to treatment, at the age of 65.

In the 1980s, Zheng Yonggang served as the manager of a state-owned cotton textile factory. With his new assignment, he became the manager of Ningbo Yinzhou Clothing Co., Ltd., the predecessor of Sino-Pacific, in 1989.

In the 20th CCPIT Enterprise Leaders Annual Conference and the 22nd China Enterprise Future Star Annual Conference in December 2022, Zheng Yonggang stated in his speech that the market share of Sisipan brand in China's suit market during the 1990s reached 37%.
Sanyo Securities (600884.SH) went public in 1996, becoming the first listed company in China's clothing industry.

When the clothing business was thriving like never before, Shengshan Group started transforming, as Zheng Yonggang realized that "once the market is liberalized, Chinese brands will naturally form a hierarchical market, and the possibility of Shengshan Shirts remaining the trendsetter and the preferred national brand for the Chinese is not high."

In 1999, Sheng Sheng started researching corporate transformation. Zheng Yonggang recalled at the time, "We went to Shanghai to find out what exactly transformation meant, and we invited numerous experts and scholars for continuous seminars and discussions, such as Luoge Rong Hui and Wuxu Research Forums."
In the end, we established two major strategic directions.
The first direction is new energy and new materials, the other is big health with a future.

After determining the strategic direction, Siping started looking for partnerships. At that time, Anshan Heat Power Plant was conducting carbon research for Ansteel as part of the National 863 Project. Due to insufficient research funding, Siping and Anshan Carbon Research Institute signed a cooperation agreement to jointly promote the industrialization of the "intermediate carbon microspheres" project under the National 863 Project, engaging in the development, production, and sales of negative materials, and achieving the commercial promotion of negative materials in the domestic market.

In 2001, Sany Heavy Industry achieved mass production of middle spherical graphite, began localization to replace Japanese suppliers, and became the main domestic supplier of middle spherical graphite.
This is the first Chinese domestic company producing lithium-ion battery negative material for lithium-ion batteries. It has achieved localization of lithium-ion battery negative material in China.

With the rapid popularization of lithium batteries, Sanyo's lithium battery business began to develop gradually, and lithium material business was included in Sanyo's main business in 2007. The revenue proportion of the clothing business continued to decrease annually, until 2013 when Sanyo's lithium material business income fully surpassed that of the clothing business.

In February 2021, Sanyo Electric successfully acquired LG Chem's optoelectronic materials business, entering the LCD optoelectronic materials market, and established the optoelectronic materials company, Sanyo Gold Electron. This field has a high technology content, and Sanyo Electric's main competitors in this area are the world's top 500 companies, including Samsung from South Korea and Shin-Etsu Chemical and Hitachi Chemical from Japan.
Zheng Yonggang has shared his experiences in post-acquisition management. Why do some Chinese privately-owned companies' acquisitions of high-tech enterprises abroad fail?

Because everyone would usually consider that I spent so much money, I should send someone to manage it. But Zheng Yonggang was different. On the day of Siping's acquisition, Zheng Yonggang announced in front of everyone at Siping Jin Tian that Siping would implement a dual management system. Zheng Yonggang would serve as the chairman of the board, while Siping's personnel would not be dispatched to Siping Jin Tian. Instead, authorised management would be adopted, and the existing distribution system, corporate culture, and management modes would remain unchanged.

ICC Xinxi announced that the shipments of cork negative materials for Sipo in 2022 exceeded 200,000 tons, with a year-on-year increase of 100%, and a market share of 16%. Synthetic graphite negative materials ranked first in the charts.

In the photovoltaic cell business, Yano Research shows that the market share of Sanyo Electric, a company under its umbrella, reached 29% globally in 2022, and is projected to reach 32% in 2023, maintaining the position as the global leader.

In the first three quarters of 2022, Sipong Corporation's revenue was 158.41 billion yuan, and its net profit was 23.13 billion yuan. On February 10, 2022, the stock price of Sipong Corporation was 19.24 yuan per share, and its market capitalization was 436 billion yuan.

On February 9th, Sichuan Forestry Holdings announced on the interactive platform that the effective production capacity of carbonization for the company was approximately 100,000 tons by the end of 2022, while the carbonization capacity of the Fengjia project was still in the ramp-up phase.
Zheng Yonggang currently serves as both the chairman and the actual controller of Sipong Group's board of directors.
Zeneng Gang holds 40.1% of the total stock ownership in Siping Control Holdings Co., Ltd. according to the Sky-Eye query.

The manager of Sanyo Electric's shares is Li Zhihua, born in 1968. He has served as the chairman of Sanyo Electric Battery Materials Co., Ltd. in Dongguan City, Sanyo New Material Technology Co., Ltd. in Ningbo, and Hunan Sanyo Energy Technology Co., Ltd. He was also the deputy general manager of Ningbo Sanyo Stock Co., Ltd.
Our company's senior management and actual controllers have no familial relationships.
"The E account for funds has arrived: The CSRC authorizes the development for investors to consolidate and inquire about all their funds - Economic Observer - Professional Financial News Website"
The complex purchasing channels for mutual funds make it difficult to collect account information? (by Chen Zhang, Economic Observer reporter)
Always forgetting "the little gold mine"?
These issues of the common people will soon be resolved.
On February 10th, the China Securities Regulatory Commission announced that the "Fund E-account" APP has been listed and publicly tested on various mobile application stores.

According to the introduction, "Ji Fund E Account" is a "one-stop" query service for individual investors to inquire about their public fund account and shareholding information. It aims to address the pain points of forgetting accounts and complicated queries in the industry.

According to Wind data, as of the end of 2022, there were 156 fund management companies in China, managing assets of approximately 260 billion yuan; there were 167 registration institutions for public fund shares, and 411 sales institutions for public funds.
Each registration institution's account system is independent, lacking a unified industry query channel.
Over 7.2 billion people in the industry have reportedly invested in funds in China by the end of 2021, meaning half of the population has invested in fund products.

Previously, investors had to inquire about their purchasing situations through different sales outlets. However, with "Fund E Account," they can check their purchasing information from all sales channels, making their fund holdings clear at a glance.
"What is the 'E-account' App for investment funds?" or "What is the 'E-account' App in the context of investment funds?"

According to relevant files, the "Fund E Account" App is a mobile application developed and constructed in the securities industry of China with approval from the China Securities Regulatory Commission. It provides investors with a one-stop query for holding situations of public fund products outside the market.

Investors can conveniently and quickly oversee their holdings of mutual fund products under various fund managers outside of the market through the "Fund E Account," significantly enhancing query efficiency.

Investors can find information on their "Fund E accounts" about: the account information of mutual fund accounts opened with fund managers in the market, the account information of trading accounts opened with mutual fund sales institutions, and the holdings of various products such as publicly offered securities investment funds and collective asset management plans (exempt from the 200-person limit) managed by securities companies.

Liu Yiqian, the business manager of Shanghai Securities Fund Evaluation Research Center, told reporters from the Economic Observer that investors can obtain information about all their offshore mutual fund holdings through the "Fund E Account" App, helping them recover "forgotten assets." More importantly, it collects comprehensive mutual fund investment information for clients, allowing them to better grasp their investment situations in a timely, accurate, and complete manner, and thus optimize their mutual fund portfolio configurations and financial planning.
How do I register and use it?

Journalists have noticed that the "Fund E account" app is available on Huawei, Apple, Xiaomi, OPPO, and vivo app stores, but the app is still in the open trial running stage, and registration requires an invitation code. Investors can contact their fund manager to obtain the invitation code.

A customer service representative from a large-scale fund management company in Shanghai provided a six-digit invitation code to an Economic Observer reporter, stating, "During the trial run stage of the APP, a certain number of invitation codes are provided by China Settlement to each fund manager. Investors can obtain them by calling the phone number."
After the trial run is over, users will no longer need an invitation code to register.

The reporter completed the registration and query process for the "Fund E-account" by downloading and using the relevant files from the China Securities Regulatory Commission website in a few minutes. The process consisted of four steps: user registration, real name authentication, fund account binding, and public fund query.

After completing real name authentication, click the "Assets" button for fund binding. All fund products purchased by the reporter through various fund sales platforms will be presented in the binding option list (available accounts). Once bound, you can clearly view the total assets of invested funds and begin using the query function.
"Note that 'Fund E accounts' only provide query services for investors and cannot be used for subscriptions or redemptions."
The data date shown on a "Fund E Account" is usually three trading days prior to the date the user queries it (T day).
The total assets, share amount, and net value displayed on the "Fund E Account" asset page on February 10th correspond to the dates three trading days prior, which is February 7th.

The Trade Union once again rallies against the government's retirement reform plan.

This Saturday (February 11), the French labor union once again mobilized nationwide protests against the government's pension reform bill, urging the public to take to the streets and express their opinions.
This is the fourth social action day against the government's pension reform bill in this opposition.
The number of civilians responding to the call for assembly could influence the next course of action for labor unions.
This is the fourth nationwide mobilization initiated by the eight major labor unions in France within a month, and the first time this protest has been scheduled for a Saturday.

Considering that for most French people, Saturdays are rest days, they don't have to choose between participating in demonstrations or going on strike, labor unions hope that today's rally will attract more people to join.

The labor unions of the subway system and state-owned railways have not called for strikes today. The subway system should be able to operate normally, allowing citizens to travel to rally sites by public transportation. In areas where schools have started winter break, people can travel normally for their vacations.

Labor unions hope that over a million people will attend the rally today, while the police estimate the total number of people joining nationwide may be between 60 and 80 thousand, with around 9 to 12 thousand gathering in the Paris region.

Since the protest movements against the French government's pension reform plan began, although polls show that a majority of the French people do not support raising the legal retirement age from the current 62 to 64, the number of people actually taking to the streets to join the marches has gradually decreased.
The first labor strike and protest rally on January 31st attracted 127,000 to 250,000 people nationwide.
The protest crowd this past Tuesday (February 7) has shrunk to between 757,000 and 2 million people nationwide.
This pension reform plan is currently being discussed in the French National Assembly.
In the opposition party, particularly the radical left-wing faction, numerous amendment proposals were submitted, resulting in a very slow legislative process.
The argument between the ruling and the ruled is becoming increasingly sharp and heated.

A French left-wing political party's member recently posted a picture on social media of himself with a balloon bearing the image of the French Labor Minister's face. This led to protests from the ruling party.
The chairman of the National People's Congress has finally announced a 15-day ban on this legislator from participating in parliamentary activities as a punishment for such behavior.

Despite this reform proposal causing the largest social trend in France over the past 20 years, the government has only made minor adjustments to the bill as of now, without making any significant concessions.
The union has prepared to launch actions again on March 16, which is next Thursday. They also plan to organize a demonstration during the delivery of the reform bill to the Senate on March 7.

The last Communist Party leader of East Germany has passed away.
Hans Modrow, the successor of the East German Socialist Unity Party, passed away last night at the age of 95, as reported in a party statement.
Therefore, we have lost a important leader in our party.

On November 13, 1989, four days after the Berlin Wall separating East and West Berlin had been opened for 28 years, Modrow declared his intention to help transform East Germany into a democratic state.
At that time, due to protests for democracy and freedom in various parts of East Germany, the leaders of the Communist Party were forced to resign.
After coming to power in the Soviet Union, Gorbachev called for reforms in the Soviet-dominated Eastern Europe as well.
In March 1990, Modrow declared the first and only free elections in the German Democratic Republic (GDR).
The election results caused him to no longer serve as prime minister.
Despite Moody's reforms, opponents accused him of delaying the political transformation and unification scheduled for October 1990.
He was criticized for trying to reshape rather than abolish the secret police.
In 1993, Modesto was charged with election rigging in the May 1989 municipal elections, but was not imprisoned.
These allegations are made for political reasons.
From 1990 to 1994, Modrow continued to serve in the German parliament, and from 1999 to 2004, he was a European parliamentarian.
Modero considers himself a reformer and aspires to bring about change from within the Communist Party.
In 1999, he told Reuters that he didn't want Old East Germany to reunite, but acknowledged East Germany's achievements.
Modesto was born in Jasenitz, a German town now known as Jasienica, in 1928, and received mechanical training.

During the Second World War, he served as the leader of a youth fire brigade, and later became a member of the Volkssturm militia organization, which conscripted males aged 16 to 60 to participate in the final struggle for the war.
At the age of 17, Modero was captured by the Soviet military, taken to the Soviet Union, and there he participated in anti-fascist programs and became a committed Communist party member.
In 1949, the year East Germany was established, he returned to the country and found a job as a mechanic, while continuing to study social sciences and economics and earning a doctorate.

Modrow was a worker for the Free German Youth Movement in East Germany. Almost all young East Germans joined this movement, and he rose to become the chairman of the Socialist Unity Party (SED) in the German Democratic Republic from 1973 to 1989.
He has worked in the East German parliament for over 30 years.
In 1990, Modrow became the de facto leader of East Germany, holding the highest state offices.

Does the balloon incident make America's eyes shine brighter?
Strengthening export restrictions to China.
According to a report in the Wall Street Journal today, the US is preparing to further tighten tech exports to China after the balloon incident.

Earthquake relief work goes on day and night.

Turkish Syria has been hit by an earthquake, and rescue teams from over fifty countries have been working around the clock in the ruins of thousands of destroyed buildings to save survivors buried under debris.
In the freezing temperature, they often call for silence, as they strain to hear any signs of life from the crumbling concrete piles.
According to Reuters report today, two women were rescued from the ruins of an earthquake after surviving for several days.
The number of deaths caused by the earthquake has risen to 24,150 people.
The number of deaths in Turkey is 20,665, and the number of deaths in Syria is over 3,500.

A 7.8 magnitude earthquake occurred on a Monday, and strong aftershocks continued in Turkey and Syria. It is the seventh deadliest natural disaster of the century, surpassing the 2011 Japanese earthquake and tsunami, and approaching the 2003 earthquake in neighboring Iran that caused over 31,000 deaths.
In 1999, over 17,000 people lost their lives due to an earthquake that occurred in Turkey's western region.

Turkish authorities announced on Saturday that two women were rescued from the debris of a collapsed building after being trapped for 122 hours, which is the deadliest earthquake in the region in the past 20 years.
Another 55-year-old man, identified as Masallah Cicek, was rescued from the ruins of a collapsed building in Diyabakir, the largest city in Turkey's southeastern region.
In the freezing temperature, rescuers often urge quietness, as they strain to hear any signs of life from the crumbling concrete pile.

In the Samandag district of Turkey, rescue workers crouched under a concrete slab, whispering "Inshallah" --- "God willing" --- as they carefully extended their hands into the ruins and rescued a 10-day-old infant.
He opened his wide eyes. Baby Yagiz Ulas was wrapped in a warm blanket and carried to the field hospital.
The rescue team carried away his mother from the video image, she was dizzy and fainted on the stretcher, with a pale face but clear consciousness.
Turkish Vice President Fuat Oktay informed reporters late at night that 67 people were rescued from the ruins in the past 24 hours, and 31,000 rescue personnel were mobilized in the affected areas.
About 80,000 people are receiving treatment in the hospital, while approximately 105 million people are homeless due to the earthquake, crowded in temporary shelters.
Due to many people lacking food in the harsh winter conditions, the public's criticism of the leaders' disaster relief response is growing in both countries.

According to Syrian official media, Syrian President Bashar al-Assad and his wife Asma visited a hospital in Aleppo together. This is reportedly his first visit to a disaster area since the earthquake.

Earlier, the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations stated that due to the complexities of relief work caused by the war situation, its stocks in the northwestern Syria controlled by the rebels were about to run out.
On Thursday, Erdogan visited the Adyaman province in Turkey. He admitted that the government's response was slower than expected.
Opponents are attacking Erdoğan on this issue, he is set to stand for re-election in the voting scheduled for May 14th, but there is a possibility of postponement due to the disaster.
Reuters stated that angry emotions over delayed aid and rescue work could influence the election.
Even before an earthquake occurred, the election was considered the most challenging for Erdogan's rule in the past twenty years.
Erdao'an urged unity and condemned the so-called "passive movements carried out for political interests."
The main opposition leader of Turkey, Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, criticized the government's response.
Criticism states, "The earthquake is large, but more severe is the lack of coordination, the lack of plans, and the inability."
Vietnamese Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh and his wife visited the University of Brunei Darussalam (UBD) in Bandar Seri Begawan, Brunei on February 11, 2023.
Fudan University is the largest higher education and scientific research center in Fuzhou, ranking third among local universities in the region.
Fudan University is a symbol of cooperation in education and training between Vietnam and China.
Fudan University officially established cooperation with FPT University in Vietnam in July 2013, primarily in the field of English training.
In addition to English, French, German, Japanese, and Korean languages, Furman University also includes Vietnamese in its teaching curriculum.
During a visit to Fudan University, Vietnamese Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh and his wife interacted with students in the Vietnamese language class.

Prime Minister Nguyen Tan Dung is pleased to see more and more foreigners showing interest in learning Vietnamese, and in response, he has made active contributions to promoting Vietnamese cultural characteristics and local customs to the world.

The Prime Minister of the State Council, Ran Qingfeng, believes and hopes that the team of Vietnamese language teachers at Fudan University will continue to grow stronger; the students in the Vietnamese classes are increasingly interested in Vietnamese language, working hard to learn it fluently at an early stage, and can become ambassadors of friendly cooperation between China and Vietnam in the future.

Prime Minister Ran Qingjun took the opportunity to communicate with Vietnamese students learning English at FPT-UBD Global Center in Ho Chi Minh City via video, gaining insights into their learning situation, particularly during the pandemic.

The Prime Minister of the Chinese government, Ran Qingfeng, views the cooperation relationship between Vietnam's FPT University and La Trobe University, particularly the FPT-UBD Global Center, as a vivid symbol of educational cooperation between Vietnam and Australia.
At the same time, we hope that students of this center make greater strides in their studies and contribute positively to the friendly cooperation between China and France.

Prime Minister Ran Wen-pol highly appraised the achievements in educational cooperation between the two countries during a discussion with the Education Minister of Vietnam and the leaders of Vietnam National University. This includes the cooperation between FPT University and Vietnam National University, as well as Vietnam National University's inclusion of Vietnamese language in its curriculum.
Premier Li Keqiang hopes that Fudan University will continue to focus on ensuring the quality of Vietnamese language teaching and further expand the scale of Vietnamese language classes.

The Vietnamese government highly appreciates the positive outcomes achieved in cooperation between the two countries, based on the Education Cooperation Memorandum of Understanding signed in April 2014. It is suggested that Fulbright continue to provide more scholarships and effectively carry out various short-term exchange training programs, such as the Global Discovery Programme and Discovery Year.

Premier Li Keqiang highly appreciates Fan Meming University setting up the first campus in Vietnam; believes that the university's development scale in the region and the world will continue to grow stronger; further expanding cooperation with Vietnamese higher education institutions.
Prime Minister Ranming Polit and his wife planted a commemorative tree and left a message in the memorial book at Fulin University campus.

Premier Li Keqiang wishes for Fudan University to continue developing, contributing increasingly greater power to Fudan's educational endeavors, and expanding and deepening cooperation with various educational and training institutions in Vietnam.
Or: Completed.
