Vietnamese Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh and his spouse successfully completed an official visit to Singapore and Malaysia, achieving comprehensive, practical, and tangible results.
In the three-day visit to Singapore and Malaysia, Premier Li Keqiang attended over 30 different activities.

The achievements gained have continuously propelled the strategic partnership and comprehensive partnership between China and the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) towards deeper, broader, and more effective directions, injecting new energy.

During his visit to the two countries, Premier Li Keqiang reiterated China's external policy towards Vietnam and the state, which is independent, diversified, flexible, and willing to be a good friend and reliable partner for all countries, as well as a responsible member of the international community.

Strengthening relations with Singapore and Brunei serves the interests of both sides, dedicated to enhancing the welfare of our own peoples, and committed to peace, stability, and development in the region and the world.

At all meetings and talks, Premier Li Keqiang of China agreed with the leaders of Singapore and Malaysia that enhancing political trust through high-level delegation exchanges, effectively implementing various bilateral cooperation mechanisms and important cooperation agreements, etc., should be continued to strengthen China's relations with Vietnam.
Many cooperation documents were signed during this visit.

Among them, the "Green and Digital Economy Partnership Memorandum of Understanding between China and Singapore," and the "Action Plan for Strengthening Comprehensive Partnership between China and France during the 2023-2027 Period" are the two major highlights.
Vietnam and Singapore signed the "Green and Digital Economy Partnership Memorandum of Understanding."
Chino-Ō Express Co-op (or Chino-Ō Express Company)

At meetings with business leaders, forums, or attending economic conferences, Vietnamese Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh emphasized that Vietnam welcomes and provides favorable conditions for Singaporean and Malaysian companies to expand their investment scope in Vietnam's digital transformation, green energy, high technology, innovation, and creativity sectors.

This visit not only strengthens cooperation in politics, diplomacy, economy, security, defense, education and training, oil and gas, tourism, and people-to-people exchanges between Vietnam, Singapore, and Brunei in various traditional fields, but also creates a framework for cooperation in digital economy, green economy, energy transformation, innovation and creativity, smart cities, and sustainable development in new potential areas.
King Harold Nelson Borjas of Vlaanderen and Premier Ran Min are preparing for bilateral talks.
Chino-Ō Express Co-op (or Chino-Ō Express Company)
During his visits to both countries, Premier Li Keqiang arranged time to tour and listen to the thoughts and wishes of the Vietnamese ethnic community in the local areas.

In their leaders' meeting, Premier Li Keqiang suggested that both sides should pay more attention to, and ensure fair treatment for, the local Vietnamese community, providing opportunities to contribute to local society and cultivate bilateral relations.
This proposal has been agreed upon and supported by the leaders of both countries.

Prime Minister Li Keqiang also shared with the leaders of the two countries the desire for a united, peaceful, stable, and prosperous ASEAN community; they all agreed to maintain unity and cooperation with ASEAN countries and enhance ASEAN's central role in the region and international situation that is complex and rapidly changing.

With the achievements obtained, Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh of Vietnam conducted an official visit to Singapore and Brunei, effectively implementing the 12th resolution (12-KL/TW) of the Central Political Bureau of the Communist Party of Vietnam regarding overseas work in the new situation, and exerting the unity of the entire nation to make positive contributions.
Or: Completed.
What exactly is the "object" that was shot down in Alaska's sky?
Amidst the whirl and confusion, guesses abound.
The US military used an advanced stealth fighter jet, the F-22, to intercept and shoot down an unidentified object flying in the Alaska airspace of the US on February 10, 2023, during the afternoon.
The landing site is ten miles from the Alaskan coast.
This is the second time the US military has intercepted an aerial object within a week.
Last Saturday, a spy balloon from China floated in the US skies for several days before being destroyed off the coast of South Carolina, USA.

The Five-Starred Red Flag building stated that the second object, which was first detected in US airspace on Thursday evening in the northeastern part of Alaska, was tracked by the US military at a flight altitude of 12,000 meters (40,000 feet). Its size was roughly comparable to a small car, much smaller than the previous Chinese spy balloon intercepted.
The Five-Star Red Flag Building also does not show any signs indicating that this object can be controlled.

The White House National Security Council's strategic communications and coordination officer, John Bobbitt, stated on Thursday that although the exact shape of the object flying in the sky is unclear, it poses a reasonable threat to the safety of civilian aircraft.
Kobe stated that this object is different from the spy balloon found within the US border, as it has no "payload" suspended above it.
"Kobe said, 'We can describe it as an 'object' for now'."
Before ordering a strike on that object, Biden listened to the advice of the Pentagon, according to Kobe. He made this decision "very carefully."
The rough description of this object by the US authorities is: Approximately the size of a small car, with no control sticks or suspension systems, flying at an altitude of around 10,000 meters.
These pieces of information cannot answer basic questions such as what this object is, to which country it belongs, and what task it is performing.
Currently, many analyses and speculations online suggest that this could be another Chinese balloon.

They might be similar to the Chinese spy balloon that intruded American airspace and the Chinese balloon floating in the skies of Latin America, both originating from China, executing different tasks at separate locations.
Some people associate this "object" in Alaska with Unidentified Flying Objects (UFOs).
American news weekly reported that Peter Meijer, a former American congressman, tweeted on Friday, "I hope this 'unidentified flying object' is also a spy balloon, not a legitimate UFO."
"Comparing an alien spaceship to a weather balloon in a satirical manner may surprise people, but it's not worth causing an intergalactic conflict, Megan said."
MJ made this tweet not long after Kobe's object was knocked down in Alaska.
The news weekly suspects that this object is a UFO, not just Megan.

Tennessee Republican Congressman Tim Burchett criticized the government's handling of concealing intelligence last month and called for the Director of National Intelligence (DNI) to release reports regarding "unidentified aerial phenomena."

In high school, I picked up this book with a casual, bored attitude, thinking that such a book wouldn't be able to captivate me since I hadn't found the beginning web novels particularly appealing before.
Then, I fell into the pit.

According to the plot, the entire book is quite light and enjoyable. In the early part, Ye Xiu was still in the game world, even the power struggles among guilds were not heavy due to Ye God's Dog's interference.
In the competition part, a hint of bittersweet feelings towards the shifting eras was expressed (perhaps due to my excessive empathy).
I spent a lot of study time in high school to finish reading the entire book, but I couldn't stop.

A full-time portrayal of characters and romantic lines is extremely captivating, even minor characters leave deep impressions, such as well-developed characters like Lei Xiaodong, Huang Xiao Tian, Zi Su Orange. Characters who are not in the limelight like Jiang Jiang Wan and Chu Yun Xiu are also popular. In a light-hearted esports novel, not a single detestable character could be found, which is a success in character depiction.

In terms of emotions, there's no common flaw among the beautiful concubines in this game, be they beautiful or not, they all share a commonality - they all enjoy playing this game of glory and strive for an honorable victory.
There's nothing sinister about small-scale matters, everyone seems so simple and cute.
This might be why there's nothing dislikable about a full-time role.
The size of my full-time IP is quite large, due to this.
Setting aside the phenomenon of online articles, it is still a good book, full-time.
He genuinely provides some passion and touches people a little.

I've wanted to buy this entire set of books for a long time, but my wallet has never been thick enough to commit. When I finally decided to buy, I found that Tmall was flooded with counterfeit goods. Next, I'll briefly explain the situation with the goods.
The fourth one is missing its cover, but the book itself is new.

The 23rd and 17th are similar in some ways, but the 23rd is harder and significantly older than the 17th.
Some individual books' publishers seem to be different, but the 23rd and 17th ones appear to be the same as each other, and not the same as the others.
Overall, it's quite satisfactory. Twenty-four books make up a rather large box, and I am quite content.
Lonely little lion
I thought getting the book would be as simple as "A Farewell to Arms," but it turns out the text is quite lengthy!
I recited this book three times in succession before finishing it for the little friend. A lion that can shoot guns, a lion that loves fruit juice and candy.
When I see a scene where a lion eats a hunter, I feel a little uneasy. Modern city people find it hard to accept animals eating like this.
At the end, this little lion who had succeeded in human society, lost himself. He was no longer a complete lion, but not entirely human.
In the end, only the silhouette of the little lion remained, disappearing into the distance.
Perhaps, decades later, the image of this little lion will remain in the impression of the grown-up children. It might unexpectedly be stirred up in her mind on some day.
A collection of works with high value for money.
I didn't know about TASCHEN before, but I've bought quite a few of their books recently. The reason is that they are exceptionally good, whether it's the selection of topics or the production itself.

This work has gone through three versions. The largest version is approximately 50 centimeters long and 34 centimeters wide, similar to the complete works of Marcel Proust; the middle version is about 36 centimeters long and 23 centimeters wide; this version is the smallest and comes with a two-volume set in a box.

I personally find it acceptable, firstly because the price is low, and secondly, as it is divided into two volumes of over 700 pages each, it is more convenient to read as a paperback; secondly, unlike Michelangelo's complete works, the illustrations take up the majority of the space in this black and white sketchbook, making it the best value for budget-conscious and non-art major readers who want to enjoy the artwork and sketches.

The explanation for the painting section is excellent, covering composition analysis, draft analysis, and historical background (such as the last dinner), but I'm unsure if it's a print or book size issue, causing some shadow areas to be too deep and obscuring details, leaving me a little disappointed.
Compared to Michelangelo's manuscript, Da Vinci's manuscript is much more rich in content.
The former is already a genius, the latter's scope and achievements are not sufficient to be described as a genius.

On March 29th, I bought this book for 31 yuan through the pre-order channel, showing it would be delivered on March 31st. At that time, the Amazon website could not preview the book (because it had not been published yet).

The book that was pushed to the device on the 31st of March is blank, with only a "please wait" message; however, the e-book version of the book on Amazon is now priced at 18 yuan, or approximately 2.81 USD.

I have tried multiple times over the past two days to delete and re-sync the blank e-book downloaded on my device of "The Essence of Business," but I couldn't obtain the actual content version. However, I noticed that the Amazon website can now preview the book.
At present, I have a few thoughts.
The price issue is not the most crucial thing. The key is to replace the blank books on Kindle with ones that have real content, instead of always downloading "to be continued."

After purchasing books in advance, there's no need to buy more, for fear that one might change one's mind and end up downloading a book with empty content, and the procedures for that would be quite complicated.

I hope Amazon provides a normal channel for feedback on such issues regarding e-books downloading or usage. A place for reporting (tickets or online customer service) would be helpful, similar to how Microsoft's official store handles it.
I don't really recommend reading it.
A long time ago, I read this, and now, happening upon it again, I'll jot down some thoughts.
This book is better described as a collection of love-themed fragments from life, rather than a short story anthology.

The penmanship of this book is exceptionally tranquil, a quietness akin to plain water, the words and sentences are meticulously simple, and the plot unfolds with the stillness and calmness of a summer afternoon street.
Each piece is a snippet of the mundane life, without a beginning or an end.
Lastly, compiled together, titled "What Are We Talking About When We Talk About Love?"

I believe this collection of short stories, along with its title, is akin to a performing art, conveying that love is not just the dramatic ups and downs on stage, or the clichéd tales of the city, nor is it merely you and me, but rather, love is also the mundane, tasteless routine of daily life, the helplessness towards reality, the escape from the present, and the uncertainty of the future.
As you read this book, images of bickering spouses next to you, unappetizing marriages of acquaintances, and unsatisfying relationships may come to mind.

This is why I wouldn't recommend reading this book. From an aesthetic perspective, both the writing style and the plot are unpalatable. Unless your life is as turbulent as the stormy seas or as sweet as living in Candyland, your reading experience will feel strange and boring.

From a depth of thought perspective, the daily situations did not make one's eyes light up or expand one's thinking and vision (this differs from Marx's "Love in the Time of Revolution"). The brief segments did not delve into any issues, such as what kind of errors led to the failure of love?
What were the reasons for the breakdown of the main character's marriage?
Therefore, I don't recommend reading this book; it doesn't matter much whether you read it or not.
The author's ideas are expressed more through techniques and style rather than storyline, which contributes to a less enjoyable reading experience for this book.
Suitable for rough reading, not for detailed examination.
The logic of this book is good, but the content is not rich enough.
Although many sales theories were explained, the solutions on how to implement them were rather weak, merely suggesting directions without providing concrete methods.
Additionally, this book seems haphazardly compiled.
There are both domestic and foreign examples; there are famous businesspeople and salespeople, as well as those who are well-known but not widely recognized.
It is unclear if this is a story made up for illustrative purposes, the inclusion of author's personal experiences would make it more convincing.
The term for a customer or a client fluctuates.
The title remains as customers, but the body text becomes customers as well.
In the e-book, there were issues with typos, missing punctuation marks, and incorrect numbering.
In summary, this book is a good choice for theoretical beginners, but it is less suitable for people who already work in sales and want to improve their sales performance.
Quickly understand the introductory book on Internet finance.

This book is quite shallow and can be considered an introductory text, helping one quickly understand the scope of internet finance. However, for in-depth knowledge, one must still refer to specific resources and delve deeper on their own.
The book's timeframe is quite early, the proportion of third-party payments mentioned in the Alibaba-WeChat loan subsidies battle for user habits may not be as small as stated in the book now.
Nowadays, many people go out to eat with just their phones, and merchants have stopped using UnionPay due to high bank statements.

I still want to express my sincere thanks to the author for writing this introductory book. The author's financial observation experience is evident, making them well-versed in the financial development history of both domestic and foreign markets. This is why they were able to write such clear and understandable content.
It's easy to write lofty words, but the real challenge is making them clear and understandable to the common person.
I enjoy you, I want to let you know more!
The first criterion for determining a person's job satisfaction is not the salary, but whether they feel valued and recognized in their work.

According to Maslow's hierarchy of needs theory, after a person's basic survival needs are met, the most pressing requirement is the satisfaction of psychological needs—the desire to be understood, to be accepted, and to receive esteem.
Yes, for most Chinese people, it's "love is hard to express in words," meaning they may harbor love, gratitude, and praise silently without verbalizing it.
The author expounded upon five types of languages of appreciation in this book: affirmative language, meticulous care, servile behavior, thoughtful gifts, and physical touch.

I believe it's not important to know specifically what the five languages of praise are, but rather, to be able to use them from the heart to praise and express gratitude to the people around us, be it family, friends, or colleagues.
The closer the relationship, the more we need appreciation and gratitude, enriching our lives in the process.
Mastering the art of appreciation, enterprises can to some extent retain talent and reduce turnover rates.
We are grateful to the translator for bringing us fascinating ideas and perspectives from abroad.
Due to differences in cultural backgrounds, there may be variations in languages. If possible, seeing the original author's version would be more enriching.
Once again, thank you to the author, translator, and editors for their hard work!

Unleveled or Uneven. This term is often used in the context of surfaces or ground that is not flat or even.

The reviews I read were all good, so I was looking forward to this pot. When I held it in my hands, I liked it because it was light. However, I found a problem when I started cooking. The bottom of the pot is not flat; it protrudes in the middle and sinks in around the edges, causing the oil to pool at the edges instead of covering the central area where I had specifically bought large pieces of meat to cook. The pot couldn't be used for cooking properly in this condition.
I didn't know if it was bad luck or not, but I accidentally got a crooked bottomed pot. Fortunately, Amazon provided a month-long return service, so I returned it without hesitation.
I cleaned the wok thoroughly and worked hard for half a day.
A good product design requires matching manufacturing processes to implement it.
This is a product with a very simple design style.
The cube's shape, the designer made the top slightly concave.
Originally, it should be very fluid lines.
Too bad the final result couldn't be achieved.
Because the top part has two components: the control panel at the front, and the water tank lid at the back.
The radii of the top cover and the control panel are inconsistent, resulting in a height difference of approximately 2mm when assembled.
Although it looks like a very small gap.
However, it managed to destroy the entire design aesthetic.
I feel a little sorry for that product designer.
It seems that the product manager of the beautiful company is not capable of producing a product of this standard yet.

The after-sales lady's indifferent and honest attitude towards the issue made me realize that I cannot have high expectations for the product's quality, as she mentioned that all units have the same issue, not just mine, which had malfunctioned twice - once in July 2019, and the second time only two weeks after the first repair.

I contacted Xiaomi customer service about this problem, but they didn't have a solution and instructed me to contact Amazon for a refund.

Another point worth noting is that users have commented online that this camera only supports memory cards with a minimum capacity of 8G, and cards with smaller capacities cannot be recognized. Please take note of this.
The feel is still usable, the screen is acceptable, but the sound quality is quite poor, and the machine generates some heat when running continuously, which is a bit uncomfortable.
Based on what has been said, this product still has many shortcomings. Please be cautious when making a purchase.
I gave it a 3-star rating because it was the first love purchase I made in my life, we were together for nearly three years, and it left me last year. I have felt this way until now.
I gave it a 3-star rating because I bought it for my first love in life. I'm not sure how much use I have for it now, I might even throw it away!

We had been in a relationship for over three years, and then she left me last year out of the blue. Thinking about her now makes my heart ache, and I still can't get over the first woman in my life who cast a shadow and caused me pain throughout my life. I haven't been able to move on yet.

When buying this phone back then, I thought of two feelings, we could endure the suffering together, but now I can't bear to look back, perhaps that's just how life is, some people never want to meet certain people in their lifetime, some things they never want to know, but what can be done?

Every time I see a Samsung phone, her image appears in my mind, and the pain follows suit, filling me up completely. I have never been able to bring myself to use a phone costing over 2,000 yuan, but when I bought it for her, I didn't hesitate. No matter how much I loved someone, but when she changed her mind, all promises and vows turned to nothing.
Premium brands from domestic production.
Huawei is a top-notch Chinese brand.

The low-key boss and the company rely on technology and quality to win customers, which is quite different from the business atmosphere that relies on advertising operations to increase recognition nowadays!
A company without the capability cannot possibly do that, and would not dare to do so!
It is because of this that I chose Huawei.
I've used it for more than half a year, and I feel it's been great, very satisfactory.
I didn't give it a perfect score because once, when using its offline navigation, I encountered a positioning issue which I couldn't resolve, but it worked well in other instances.

It has improved its online input of destinations, searches for routes automatically, and its offline navigation function is very useful when leaving Wi-Fi to travel. It directly communicates with satellites for positioning and navigation, making it convenient without using data.
Sony is great.
Sony's low-end models still have a rich design sense, are affordable, have a large enough screen, and have excellent battery life, making them very suitable for the elderly.
Although a lot of time has passed, this machine still functions well.
Because I have uninstalled Z2 from my phone, this phone has completed its mission.
